last_episode_to_air.name: Into the Cold
last_episode_to_air.overview: With the UN voting to outlaw independent spy agencies, Archer and the gang have to work outside the law to save the world from an unlikely duo.

name: Archer
overview: Sterling Archer is the world's most daunting spy. He works for ISIS, a spy agency run by his mother. In between dealing with his boss and his co-workers - one of whom is his ex-girlfriend - Archer manages to annoy or seduce everyone that crosses his path. His antics are only excusable because at the end of the day, he still somehow always manages to thwart whatever crises was threatening mankind.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: After the death of his fiancé, Archer goes missing for three months. Malory sends a former agent named Rip Riley to find him and bring him back. With Archer's resistance, he ends up stranding them out at sea and mixing them up with pirates.

seasons.name: Vice
seasons.overview: Archer Vice transitions into a new format, moving away from the spy genre and depicting the characters embarking on a life of crime as they attempt to sell cocaine to fund their retirements.

seasons.name: Season 7
seasons.overview: The Figgis Agency presents all new challenges, the most difficult of which might be the move to Los Angeles.

seasons.name: Dreamland
seasons.overview: Season eight, Dreamland, features Archer’s quest to find his partner’s killer in 1947 Los Angeles. The case turns into a deadly game of tug of war between Los Angeles' most powerful crime bosses with every clue leading Archer deeper into a mystery involving kidnapping, prostitution and drug addiction.

seasons.name: Danger Island
seasons.overview: Season nine finds our hero, the barely functioning alcoholic seaplane pilot Sterling Archer, resting on a lovely island in the South Pacific circa 1939. While the rest of the world is concerned about the impending Second World War, Archer is only concerned with who’s buying his next drink. Along with his trusty co-pilot Pam, Sterling must navigate quicksand, cannibals, super-intelligent monkeys, poison darts, pirates, and did we mention quicksand?

Season 10 follows Sterling Archer, Lana Kane, and their crew of acid-tongued misfits onboard the M/V Seamus salvage ship. An important question arises as they explore deep space and try to outsmart giant aliens, intergalactic pirates, and vicious bounty hunters: how do they survive each other? Welcome to the space-tastic world of Archer: 1999. Brace for the thrust.

seasons.name: Season 11
seasons.overview: Season 11 follows Sterling Archer and his return to the spy world after a three-year coma. While many things changed during his absence, Archer is confident it will take just a little time for him to reset things back to the old ways. The problem: does the rest of the team want that? Everyone else has been doing pretty well and may not be ready for his return to throw a wrench in their well-oiled machine.

seasons.name: Season 12
seasons.overview: Season 12 follows Archer and gang as they face a new threat: a spy conglomerate known as IIA (International Intelligence Agency). With a limited number of spy jobs up for grabs, can the Agency compete against the soulless vultures of IIA, or will our mom-and-pop spy agency be the next to get swallowed alive?

seasons.name: Season 13
seasons.overview: In season 13, The Agency have been acquired by the spy conglomerate known as IIA (International Intelligence Agency). As Archer and gang struggle to find their identity performing odd missions for Fabian, one question arises: will they be able to maintain independence, or will they succumb to their corporate overlords?

seasons.name: Season 14
seasons.overview: In Season 14, Archer and The Agency are finding their own way with Lana at the helm. Her goal is to make money while also making the world a better place, but she quickly finds out running a spy agency isn't so cut and dry.

tagline: Spy life is the high life.

episodes.name: Mole Hunt
episodes.overview: Archer is in trouble with his Mother and the Comptroller because his expense account is way out of proportion to his actual expenses. So he creates the idea that a Mole has breached ISIS and he needs to get into the mainframe to hunt him down (so he can cover his tracks!). All this leads to a surprising ending.

episodes.name: Training Day
episodes.overview: Lana's residual lust for Archer prompts Malory to promote Cyril to field agent. Archer then trains his new competition as only he can, whilst Malory frets over her own past and her son's future.

episodes.name: Diversity Hire
episodes.overview: Owing to a rash of agent deaths (the result of Sterling's carelessness), ISIS can't meet government diversity standards. Enter the gruffly elegant Conway Stern, an "onyx" agent who wears a Star of David around his neck. Conway is "a diversity double whammy," gushes Malory, but that and his secret-agent skills aren't the only reasons she hired him.

episodes.name: Killing Utne
episodes.overview: Malory hosts a dinner party for the UN intelligence chairman, Torvald Utne, in an effort to get a new weapons contract for ISIS. Unfortunately, a group of rival assassins have targeted Mr. Utne for elimination.

episodes.name: Honeypot
episodes.overview: Malory's career is threatened when a sensitive videotape falls into the hands of a rogue (and roguish) Cuban agent, so she calls on Archer’s expertise in seduction to turn the tables on her blackmailer.

episodes.name: Skorpio
episodes.overview: Archer must rescue Lana from the clutches of Skorpio, the infamous arms dealer. Meanwhile, Cyril fears not only for his girlfriend's life, but her succumbing to the seductive nature of Archer's heroics.

episodes.name: Skytanic
episodes.overview: When a bomb threat jeopardizes the maiden voyage of the luxury airship Excelsior, Archer and the ISIS crew must battle the clock (and each other) to avert disaster.

episodes.name: The Rock
episodes.overview: After ISIS loses yet another lucrative contract to rival agency ODIN, Malory assigns Archer and Lana to embarrass ODIN by stealing a priceless diamond from their biggest client.

episodes.name: Job Offer
episodes.overview: When Archer takes a higher-paying job at rival agency ODIN, Malory will stop at nothing to get him back.

episodes.name: Dial M for Mother
episodes.overview: Questions about the identity of Archer's real father lead him into a perilous trap... and an explosive confrontation with Malory.

episodes.name: Swiss Miss
episodes.overview: In yet another attempt to secure funding for ISIS, Malory drags her agents to the luxury winter resort town of Gstaad to protect a Swiss billionaire's daughter from a kidnapping threat. But Archer soon finds out the real threat is his protectee: an underage nymphomaniac who will stop at nothing to bed the world’s greatest spy.

episodes.name: A Going Concern
episodes.overview: After Malory is wiped out in a Ponzi scheme, she hatches a scheme of her own: selling ISIS - lock, stock and snack machines - to archrival spy agency ODIN. Archer and the rest of the ISIS employees, rightfully fearing for their jobs, must use every trick in the book (ISIS Field Manual, 3rd Edition) to try to stop the sale.

episodes.name: Blood Test
episodes.overview: When Archer's favorite call girl suddenly arrives for a visit, Archer is shocked to learn that she claims her new baby boy was fathered by him.  She obtains a court order that forces him to take a paternity test in hopes of proving her claim.

episodes.name: Pipeline Fever
episodes.overview: Archer and Lana head to Louisiana to stop an ecoterrorist from blowing up a natural-gas pipeline. (Archer’s also looking forward to a Big Easy vacation.) Back at ISIS headquarters, Mallory orders the staff to go green to get “freebie socialist tax credits.” A flashback recalls Lana’s introduction to ISIS.

episodes.name: The Double Deuce
episodes.overview: When members of Woodhouse's famed WWI Royal Flying Corps squadron start dying mysteriously, Archer tries to track down the killer.

episodes.name: Tragical History
episodes.overview: Cyril agrees to help George Spelvin inject a virus into the ISIS mainframe so Cyril can defeat the virus and be seen as a hero.

episodes.name: Movie Star
episodes.overview: On Malory's orders, Lana helps Hollywood star Rona Thorne (voice of Rachael Harris) research her role in a spy thriller while Malory writes a role for herself in the movie (with Cyril's reluctant assistance). Meanwhile, Pam steals Rona's diary.

episodes.name: Stage Two
episodes.overview: Breast cancer strikes the Archer family---Sterling has it. "I'm trying to stay positive," he says. "I can beat this." But before surgery, he wants to bond with young Seamus (even though he isn't actually the baby's father) and take a Las Vegas vacation.

episodes.name: Placebo Effect
episodes.overview: When Archer discovers that the chemotherapy drugs he has been taking are phony, he goes on a rampage against the Irish gangsters behind the scheme. He also makes friends with a fellow marijuana-toking cancer patient (voice of Joan Van Ark). Meanwhile, Cyril learns why Krieger is fluent in Portuguese.

episodes.name: El Secuestro
episodes.overview: Pam is abducted by kidnappers who mistake her for Cheryl. It seems that Cheryl wasn’t completely forthcoming about her background when she applied for her job at ISIS.

episodes.name: Jeu Monegasque
episodes.overview: When a mysterious stranger summons Malory and her intrepid ISIS agents to Monaco, all bets are off! Well, actually all bets are on. Because Monaco is basically one giant casino, and Archer has $4 million in untraceable bearer bonds. Also, it's Gran Prix week, so you can just forget getting a hotel room

episodes.name: White Nights
episodes.overview: Archer's search for his father's identity leads him into hot water.  Agent Barry Dylan is sent to rescue Archer.

episodes.name: Double Trouble
episodes.overview: Krieger works to finish a top-secret project, and Archer brings a mysterious former KGB agent named Katya Kazanova home to meet Malory.

episodes.name: The Man from Jupiter
episodes.overview: Archer is shocked to learn that his mother is dating Archer's idol/hero/man-crush, Burt Reynolds.

episodes.name: El Contador
episodes.overview: Cyril is promoted to field agent, while Malory institutes a strict drug-testing policy. Neither of which sit well with the staff of ISIS.

episodes.name: The Limited
episodes.overview: The Royal Canadian Mounted Police enlist the help of ISIS to transport a captured Canadian terrorist. On a train.

episodes.name: Drift Problem
episodes.overview: Archer's surprise birthday present - a high-tech, souped-up spy car - leads to all sorts of other surprises. None of which are good.

episodes.name: Lo Scandalo
episodes.overview: Malory turns to Archer and Lana for help when she finds herself in a compromising situation with the Italian prime minister.

episodes.name: Bloody Ferlin
episodes.overview: Archer must help Gillette save his younger brother from a crooked sheriff in the backwoods of West Virginia.

episodes.name: Crossing Over
episodes.overview: Archer's sex life compromises his effectiveness as an agent. But more seriously than the countless other times.

episodes.name: Skin Game
episodes.overview: Archer is faced with a dilemma when his murdered fiance, Katya, miraculously reappears. In Krieger's lab.

episodes.name: Space Race (1)
episodes.overview: Archer and his colleagues at ISIS voyage to the final frontier in an effort to prevent a catastrophe on the International Space Station.

episodes.name: Space Race (2)
episodes.overview: Archer and the rest of ISIS are held captive by mutineers on the International Space Station.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: After the death of his fiancé, Archer goes missing for three months. Malory sends a former agent named Rip Riley to find him and bring him back. With Archer's resistance, he ends up stranding them out at sea and mixing them up with pirates.

episodes.name: Fugue and Riffs
episodes.overview: Archer has amnesia and decides the only cure is a spa weekend.

episodes.name: The Wind Cries Mary
episodes.overview: Archer and his former best friend are holed up in the Vermont wilderness, fighting hard to come out on top.

episodes.name: Legs
episodes.overview: Archer's fear of cyborgs hits home when Krieger offers to make robotic legs for Gillette.

episodes.name: Midnight Ron
episodes.overview: The beginning of beautiful hatred between Archer and his new stepfather plays out as the two are chased by gangsters.

episodes.name: Viscous Coupling
episodes.overview: Archer's former fiancée calls on him to rescue her cyborg boyfriend from outer space, but he has other things on his mind.

episodes.name: Once Bitten
episodes.overview: Archer is bitten by a snake in a "special place".

episodes.name: Live and Let Dine
episodes.overview: Archer, Lana, and Cyril go undercover in celebrity chef Lance Casteau's hellish kitchen.

episodes.name: Coyote Lovely
episodes.overview: Archer heads to the Mexican border to capture a notorious coyote, which is Spanish for coyote.

episodes.name: The Honeymooners
episodes.overview: Archer and Lana pose as newlyweds to stop a sale of enriched uranium.

episodes.name: Un Chien Tangerine
episodes.overview: Archer and Lana extract an agent from Morocco only to find out his bark is worse than his bite.

episodes.name: The Papal Chase
episodes.overview: Archer must rescue the Pope from an assassination plot using Woodhouse as a decoy. Operation Bad Habit is a go.

episodes.name: Sea Tunt (1)
episodes.overview: Cheryl's brother Cecil Tunt and his girlfriend Tiffy drive her crazier than usual as they travel into the Bermuda Triangle. Where mysteries abound!.

episodes.name: Sea Tunt (2)
episodes.overview: Archer and the ISIS crew go to an underwater SEA LABoratory to stop the deranged Captain Murphy.

episodes.name: White Elephant
episodes.overview: ISIS is raided and disbanded by the U.S. government when it transpires that the agency was never sanctioned by them. Its former staff discover a hidden vault containing one-ton of cocaine, and form a drug cartel to sell the drugs to fund their retirements.

episodes.name: A Kiss While Dying
episodes.overview: Archer, Pam and Lana travel to Miami to visit some old friends. It's a fondue party!

episodes.name: A Debt of Honor
episodes.overview: Pam makes a deal that puts everyone in danger; Archer dons his slightly darker black suit.

episodes.name: House Call
episodes.overview: Archer has to stage an intervention for Pam that gets derailed by an unwanted guest.

episodes.name: Southbound and Down
episodes.overview: Malory buys a bus and takes everyone on a road trip. Put that hammer down and give it hell.

episodes.name: Baby Shower
episodes.overview: Archer decides to give Lana the perfect baby shower gift by forcing Kenny Loggins to sing a duet with Cherlene. Something something Danja Zown!

episodes.name: Smugglers' Blues
episodes.overview: Archer travels to Columbia on a secret mission that becomes not so secret after he gets drunk.

episodes.name: The Rules of Extraction
episodes.overview: Archer, Ray, and Cyril raft down a crocodile-filled river while Lana and Pam plan a spa day for Malory.

episodes.name: On the Carpet
episodes.overview: Archer avoids crash landing in a dangerous swamp only to come face-to-face with a shady arms dealer.

episodes.name: Palace Intrigue (1)
episodes.overview: Archer and the rest of the ISIS gang are the guests of Gustavo Calderon and his wife Juliana. Calderon is a big fan of Cherlene but Juliana is a bigger fan of Archer.

episodes.name: Palace Intrigue (2)
episodes.overview: Archer tries to keep his fling with the dictator's wife a secret while Krieger bonds with his clone-brothers.

episodes.name: Filibuster
episodes.overview: Cyril becomes the new president of San Marcos, Cherlene becomes the first lady of country music, and Archer becomes a resistance fighter.

episodes.name: Arrival/Departure
episodes.overview: Archer helps Lana with the delivery of her baby, while Krieger tries to prevent the delivery of a deadly weapon.

5.name: Vice
5.overview: Archer Vice transitions into a new format, moving away from the spy genre and depicting the characters embarking on a life of crime as they attempt to sell cocaine to fund their retirements.

episodes.name: The Holdout
episodes.overview: Archer must salvage a crashed plane in a jungle filled with relics from World War II.

episodes.name: Three to Tango
episodes.overview: An agent from the past has a hand in creating tension between Archer and Lana.

episodes.name: The Archer Sanction
episodes.overview: Archer, Lana, and Ray climb their way to the top of an assassin’s hit list.

episodes.name: Edie's Wedding
episodes.overview: Pam takes Archer to her sister's wedding but gets side-tracked with technical difficulties.

episodes.name: Vision Quest
episodes.overview: The gang gets to work early so they can spend some quality time together.

episodes.name: Sitting
episodes.overview: Archer’s first weekend alone with baby AJ is soiled by a Pakistani intelligence officer.

episodes.name: Nellis
episodes.overview: A rescue mission turns into an out-of-this-world visit to Area 51.

episodes.name: The Kanes
episodes.overview: Lana introduces Archer to her parents. Archer introduces Lana's parents to high-speed chases.

episodes.name: Pocket Listing
episodes.overview: Slater has the gang swindle the Durhani royal family and Gillette lends a hand.

episodes.name: Reignition Sequence
episodes.overview: An office romance is interrupted by the Russians.

episodes.name: Achub Y Morfilod
episodes.overview: Archer and Lana travel to Wales for a romantic getaway of aiding separatists.

episodes.name: Drastic Voyage (1)
episodes.overview: Archer and the gang prepare for their most fantastic voyage ever.

episodes.name: Drastic Voyage (2)
episodes.overview: The fantastic voyage concludes.

episodes.name: The Figgis Agency
episodes.overview: In the seventh season premiere, Archer breaks into a mansion to repair a Hollywood starlet's honor.

episodes.name: The Handoff
episodes.overview: Archer and Lana make a handoff while the others listen to the best voicemail ever.

episodes.name: Deadly Prep
episodes.overview: A business opportunity arises at a prep school reunion.

episodes.name: Motherless Child
episodes.overview: A mysterious stranger surfaces and asks Archer to help him find his birth mother.

episodes.name: Bel Panto (1)
episodes.overview: A fundraiser goes awry due to party crashers.

episodes.name: Bel Panto (2)
episodes.overview: Archer and Lana go missing as a hostage situation gets out of control

episodes.name: Double Indecency
episodes.overview: Who's sexier, Cyril or Krieger? Pam or Cheryl? Only one way to find out: bar fight!

episodes.name: Liquid Lunch
episodes.overview: The on-again, off-again relationship of Archer and Slater causes a rift in the on-again, off-again relationship of Archer and Lana.

episodes.name: Deadly Velvet (1)
episodes.overview: Archer and the gang are hired by renowned director, Ellis Crane, to investigate suspicious activity on the set of his new movie, Deadly Velvet.

episodes.name: Deadly Velvet (2)
episodes.overview: Things get even deadlier on the set of Deadly Velvet when someone turns up, you guessed it, dead.

7.name: Season 7
7.overview: The Figgis Agency presents all new challenges, the most difficult of which might be the move to Los Angeles.

episodes.name: No Good Deed
episodes.overview: Archer tries to find out who killed his partner, but accidentally gets in bed with Mother, a notorious L.A. crime boss.

episodes.name: Berenice
episodes.overview: A mysterious woman hires Archer to fake her death but Archer is unable to rise to the occasion.

episodes.name: Jane Doe
episodes.overview: Archer tries to escape from jail with the help of a crazed heiress and a dysfunctional jazz quartet.

episodes.name: Ladyfingers
episodes.overview: While investigating a kidnapping, Archer reveals too much about Figgis and Krieger reveals too much about his past.

episodes.name: Sleepers Wake
episodes.overview: Lana tries to seduce Archer for a cut of the ransom as he races Figgis and Poovey to collect the money.

episodes.name: Waxing Gibbous
episodes.overview: All roads lead to Len Trexler as Archer and the gang try to avoid unfriendly ghosts.

episodes.name: Gramercy, Halberd!
episodes.overview: Archer and Trexler try to escape a rampaging Dutch by telling the world's worst knock-knock joke.

episodes.name: Auflösung
episodes.overview: Archer discovers that he has a twin brother that works as account manager for the Chinese government.

8.name: Dreamland
8.overview: Season eight, Dreamland, features Archer’s quest to find his partner’s killer in 1947 Los Angeles. The case turns into a deadly game of tug of war between Los Angeles' most powerful crime bosses with every clue leading Archer deeper into a mystery involving kidnapping, prostitution and drug addiction.

episodes.name: Strange Pilot
episodes.overview: Archer inserts himself into a domestic dispute and engine troubles threaten to ruin his business.

episodes.name: Disheartening Situation
episodes.overview: Archer estimates his impact on the world while Pam samples the local nightlife.

episodes.name: Different Modes of Preparing the Fruit
episodes.overview: Archer, Pam, and Crackers try to find the missing key to their latest get-rich-quick scheme.

episodes.name: A Warrior in Costume
episodes.overview: Archer keeps an eye out for a past nemesis.

episodes.name: Strange Doings in the Taboo Groves
episodes.overview: But there is no joy in Mudville- mighty Pam has struck out.

episodes.name: Some Remarks on Cannibalism
episodes.overview: Archer and Pam try to escape the cannibals with the less-than-willing help of an anthropologist while everyone else races to the idol.

episodes.name: Comparative Wickedness of Civilized and Unenlightened Peoples
episodes.overview: Archer helps defend a village from party crashers intent on ruining oysterfest.

episodes.name: A Discovery
episodes.overview: The Band finally close on a discovery.

9.name: Danger Island
9.overview: Season nine finds our hero, the barely functioning alcoholic seaplane pilot Sterling Archer, resting on a lovely island in the South Pacific circa 1939. While the rest of the world is concerned about the impending Second World War, Archer is only concerned with who’s buying his next drink. Along with his trusty co-pilot Pam, Sterling must navigate quicksand, cannibals, super-intelligent monkeys, poison darts, pirates, and did we mention quicksand?

episodes.name: Bort the Garj
episodes.overview: Archer and the crew of the Seamus wake up to the smell of shepherd's pie and see a business opportunity in their new guest.

episodes.name: Happy Borthday
episodes.overview: The crew provides entertainment for Bort while Barry-6 tries to crack Archer's safe.

episodes.name: The Leftovers
episodes.overview: Pam's sandwich ruins everyone's dinner by releasing something deep inside of them.

episodes.name: Dining with the Zarglorp
episodes.overview: Deep in space, Archer and the crew encounter a terrifying cosmic beast. Even deeper, they encounter a self-aggrandizing life coach.

episodes.name: Mr. Deadly Goes to Town
episodes.overview: Archer and the crew pick up a hitchhiker and try to convince him to turn his life around.

episodes.name: Road Trip
episodes.overview: Daydreams of an interstellar road trip turn into an existential nightmare. Written by Mike Arnold.

episodes.name: Space Pirates
episodes.overview: A voyage home gets interrupted by an alien battle cruiser carrying precious cargo.

episodes.name: Cubert
episodes.overview: Archer is convinced a mysterious object is causing the crew to act strangely. Is it magnetic? Is it supernatural? Does it need to be cleaned with some sterile wipes?

episodes.name: Robert De Niro
episodes.overview: When a trial turns into a party it can only mean that Barry-6 has returned!

10.overview: Season 10 follows Sterling Archer, Lana Kane, and their crew of acid-tongued misfits onboard the M/V Seamus salvage ship. An important question arises as they explore deep space and try to outsmart giant aliens, intergalactic pirates, and vicious bounty hunters: how do they survive each other? Welcome to the space-tastic world of Archer: 1999. Brace for the thrust.

episodes.name: The Orpheus Gambit
episodes.overview: Archer is back in the spy game and his first mission is to guard a priceless statue; then, he must tell Lana his true feelings and get blind drunk.

episodes.name: Bloodsploosh
episodes.overview: Archer and the gang attend a martial arts tournament to capture an international arms dealer.

episodes.name: Helping Hands
episodes.overview: The Agency attempts to steal experimental technology from a reclusive inventor, but they forgot one vital item... Sterling Archer.

episodes.name: Robot Factory
episodes.overview: Archer and the gang team up with Barry to stop an army of Barrys from turning the world into Barrys.

episodes.name: Best Friends
episodes.overview: Archer is head over heels for his new valet, Aleister. Will Archer do Aleister's recommended rehabilitation exercises or just eat himself to death?

episodes.name: The Double Date
episodes.overview: Archer shows off his date to Lana. Cyril shows Archer's date a top-secret dossier. Archer's date shows Archer his innermost desires.

episodes.name: Caught Napping
episodes.overview: When AJ is kidnapped, it's up to Archer to get her back and keep Lana's rampage pointed in the right direction.

episodes.name: Cold Fusion
episodes.overview: Archer and the gang travel to Antarctica to solve a murder mystery with international implications.

11.name: Season 11
11.overview: Season 11 follows Sterling Archer and his return to the spy world after a three-year coma. While many things changed during his absence, Archer is confident it will take just a little time for him to reset things back to the old ways. The problem: does the rest of the team want that? Everyone else has been doing pretty well and may not be ready for his return to throw a wrench in their well-oiled machine.

episodes.name: Identity Crisis
episodes.overview: Archer and the gang just saved the world from a nuclear catastrophe and their reward is five nights in a rat-infested Moldovan hotel.

episodes.name: Lowjacked
episodes.overview: The Agency embarks on a team building exercise that doesn't quite get off the ground.

episodes.name: London Time
episodes.overview: A mission across the pond turns into a trip down memory lane for Malory while Cheryl/Carol teaches Pam about British history.

episodes.name: Photo Op
episodes.overview: Archer and Lana face off against snakes, crocodiles and mercenaries to reunite a family.

episodes.name: Shots
episodes.overview: Sex, drugs, and monster trucks! Archer and the gang celebrate another barely successful mission.

episodes.name: Dingo, Baby, Et Cetera
episodes.overview: Lana makes rookie mistakes as ghosts from Archer's past haunt him on a special mission.

episodes.name: Colt Express
episodes.overview: A mysterious stranger and a scavenger hunt helps Archer and the gang get a jump on their enemies.

episodes.name: Mission: Difficult
episodes.overview: Archer is trapped inside IIA headquarters and Barry is trapped inside Other Barry.

12.name: Season 12
12.overview: Season 12 follows Archer and gang as they face a new threat: a spy conglomerate known as IIA (International Intelligence Agency). With a limited number of spy jobs up for grabs, can the Agency compete against the soulless vultures of IIA, or will our mom-and-pop spy agency be the next to get swallowed alive?

episodes.name: The Big Con
episodes.overview: Free drinks, party rooms and swag bags are just a few of the things the gang is not enjoying at the world's foremost spy convention, Clandesti-con!

episodes.name: Operation: Fang
episodes.overview: Gillette is in charge of a creepy crawly mission in a tropical jungle.

episodes.name: Saturday
episodes.overview: Mommy daughter day turns into a lesson in fellowship and tactical awareness.

episodes.name: The Laws of Attraction
episodes.overview: Fabian tasks The Agency with recovering a piece of valuable tech from a nefarious threat, the Swiss!

episodes.name: Out of Network
episodes.overview: Archer seeks professional help but IIA's health plan is murder.

episodes.name: Bank Run at Mr. Bank's Bank
episodes.overview: Is Fabian asking The Agency to rob a bank? No, because we won't use those words.

episodes.name: Distraction Action
episodes.overview: Archer has a brilliant plan to evade capture. There is only one problem, he refuses to follow it.

episodes.name: Dough, Ray and Me
episodes.overview: Archer and the gang knead proof in order to temper expectations and ice the mission.

13.name: Season 13
13.overview: In season 13, The Agency have been acquired by the spy conglomerate known as IIA (International Intelligence Agency). As Archer and gang struggle to find their identity performing odd missions for Fabian, one question arises: will they be able to maintain independence, or will they succumb to their corporate overlords?

episodes.name: The Anglerfish Stratagem
episodes.overview: The Agency teams up with Interpol to take down a highly organized ring of jewel thieves. Archer’s skeptical as their Interpol contact seems to be treating the mission as more of an audition... but for which side?

episodes.name: 30 for 30
episodes.overview: Zara Khan thinks she’s a real knockout, but Archer wants to prove he is just as stunning. Pam and Gillette sit back and keep score.

episodes.name: Plaque Removal
episodes.overview: Archer, Lana and Zara travel to England to stop a thief who is stealing possibly-cursed artifacts. Can Archer break the curse before it breaks him?

episodes.name: Chill Barry
episodes.overview: Barry’s back, but will he give the gang the cold shoulder in their quest to put Other Barry on ice?

episodes.name: Keys Open Doors
episodes.overview: An unplanned vacation forces Lana to accompany Archer, Pam and Cyril on a mission that quickly goes off the rails. Will Lana blow the mission when she crosses the line?

episodes.name: Face Off
episodes.overview: Archer tries to find an elusive villain at an exclusive resort, while Lana learns some explosive truths about running a spy agency.

episodes.name: Mission Out of Control Room
episodes.overview: Lana monitors simultaneous missions in her state-of-the-art control room, but Archer and the gang experience technical difficulties.

episodes.name: Breaking Fabian
episodes.overview: A former adversary lends a hand as Archer and the gang bond together to try and stop a fleet of killer drones.

episodes.name: Into the Cold
episodes.overview: With the UN voting to outlaw independent spy agencies, Archer and the gang have to work outside the law to save the world from an unlikely duo.

14.name: Season 14
14.overview: In Season 14, Archer and The Agency are finding their own way with Lana at the helm. Her goal is to make money while also making the world a better place, but she quickly finds out running a spy agency isn't so cut and dry.
